name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro is the best phone Apple produces and it received a stellar score in our review. The new smartphone adds a third rear camera with 3x optical zoom (up from 2x on the iPhone 12), a stainless steel body and a ProMotion screen with refresh rates up to 120Hz for smoother scrolling.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22+
description: The Samsung Galaxy S22+ blends top-notch connectivity and performance with the best mix of features and size for the price, making it the flagship Android phone to beat.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra Smartphone
description: The S22 Ultra is the true successor to the Galaxy Note line, delivering all the excellent Samsung phone features while making no concessions for size, weight, or price.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold3 5G giant screen gives it productivity powers no other phone can match.

name: Sunbeam F1
description: The Sunbeam F1 helps digital disconnectors target exactly the level of communication they want.
